name: d3-parallel-links
description: Computes multiple parallel links between two nodes in graphs
author: Ram Tobolski

scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-parallel-links.js -c -m -o build/d3-parallel-links.min.js
scripts.postpublish: bestzip -j build/d3-parallel-links.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-parallel-links.js build/d3-parallel-links.min.js
